page.title: 15SCHOOL P.T.A.
page.content: AMONGST OUR AIMS THIS YEAR WE WANT TO INCREASE THE NUMBER OF BOOKS AT THE SCHOOL. WE ARE HOPING TO ADD TO THE MUSICAL INSTRUMENTS IN THE SCHOOL, AND TO PURCHASE A LANGUAGE MASTER. SOME PEOPLE HAVE SUGGESTED THAT THEY WOULD LIKE TO SPONSOR A BOOK OR BUY A BOOK FOR THE SCHOOL. THE NEWSPAPER COLLECTION IS GOING WELL AND THE SCHOOL HAS MANAGED TO BUY MANY USEFUL ITEMS WITH THE PROCEEDS RAISED FROM ITS SALE,INCLUDING TWO NEW COMPUTER PROGRAMS. THE SCHOOL HAS ALSO STARTED A BOTTLE BANK, AS YET WE RECEIVE NO PAYMENT FOR THIS. WE DO HOWEVER FEEL IT SERVES THE COMMUNITY,AND EVENTUALLY WE HOPE TO OBTAIN A USEFUL AMOUNT OF CASH FOR THIS SERVICE.
